---
title: an example page
format: html
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(connectwidgets)
library(dplyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

client <- connect()

all_content <- client %>%
  content()

some_content <-
  all_content %>%
  dplyr::slice_sample(prop = .25)

sample_content <- all_content %>%
  arrange(desc(updated_time)) %>%
  slice_head(n = 50)
```

![](https://source.unsplash.com/1920x1080/?forest "A random forest.")

## Components

### card

```{r card}
sample_content %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  rsc_card()
```

### grid

```{r grid}
sample_content %>%
  rsc_grid()
```

### table

```{r table}
sample_content %>%
  rsc_table()
```

### search & filter

```{r search-and-filter}
rsc_cols(rsc_search(some_content), rsc_filter(some_content), widths = c(2, 2))
rsc_table(some_content)
```
